name: The Little Matchstick Girl
description:
This game is a prototype that was created for our course's game a week semester project. The theme for this game was 'Tell us a story'.

This game is an interactive story book of The Little Matchstick Girl by Hans Christian Andersen. My main focus with this prototype was to play around with the 'story book' aesthetic which I attempted with the use of paper sprites (I unfortunately ran out of time to make all the assets out of paper sprites though....)
